dk.pervasive.jcaf.impl
Class PeerContextServiceManager

java.lang.Object
  dk.pervasive.jcaf.impl.PeerContextServiceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PeerHandler
public class PeerContextServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PeerHandler

This class handles the peer-to-peer setup for a context service, including locating peers based on their URI.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

Method Detail

addContextService

public boolean addContextService(java.lang.String service_uri)
Description copied from interface: PeerHandler
This method adds a context service as a peer. The list of peer context services are used in the lookupEntity() method.

Specified by:
addContextService in interface PeerHandler
Parameters:
service_uri - - the URI for the service to add
Returns:
true if added without any error, false othervise.

This method adds a context service as a peer. The list of peer context services are used in the lookupEntity() method.

Parameters:

Returns:
true if added without any error, false othervise.

lookupEntity

public void lookupEntity(java.lang.String id,
                         int hops,
                         RemoteDiscoveryListener dl)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method is used to discover entities amongs the known peers.

Specified by:
lookupEntity in interface PeerHandler
Parameters:
id - - the entity to look for.
hops - - the number of peers to visit.
dl - - the RemoteDiscoveryListener to call if the entity is found.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
